name: 江明理
objective: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
schedule:
PART I:  Ordinary Differential Equations (OEDs)

PART II: Linear Algebra

PART III: Fourier Analysis
materials:
1. Erwin/ Kreyszig *, Advanced Engineering Mathematics (10th ed),    (歐亞書局)

2. Peter V. O’Neil, Advanced Engineering Mathematics (8th ed),  (華泰文化)
